looks like a sleazy scumbag from a mile away, they say "Don't judge a book by the cover! #notall!! #NOTALL!!!" to hell with that liberal subversive and corrupting tactic, just look at this one, swarthy, slanted eyes, grotesque nose, all he's missing is the piercings & tattoos with the yellow dyed hair for the full "gyaru-oh" look.
How can you tell me that you wouldn't expect anything but troubles from this character. Would you be comfortable with it "dating"(more like pimping) your daughter/sister? People have two eyes and two ears + blessed with common sense, don't throw that away just so some criminal scumbag (and their advocators/apologists/masters) doesn't get its fee-fees hurt on what always ends up being a correct and justified assumption. Or else, you'll (or the people that you hold dear) end up like these two, and you don't want that, despite what media and college viruses buzz your mind about.
